channel.title: Look here before requesting ANYTHING
channel.description: Go to aryanbot.uni.cc There is a script pack of 118 scripts, and theres a good chance the script you want is in there. Check it first! Half or more of these requests are (a) useless or (b) already done and done well. Make sure if you did look at the script pack let us know and what scripts you tried. Thank you in advance for not posting topics requesting already done scripts.

item.title: Look here before requesting ANYTHING
item.dc:creator: @zappacky zappacky
item.description:
@zappacky wrote:

Go to aryanbot.uni.cc
There is a script pack of 118 scripts, and theres a good chance the script you want is in there. Check it first! Half or more of these requests are (a) useless or (b) already done and done well. Make sure if you did look at the script pack let us know and what scripts you tried. Thank you in advance for not posting topics requesting already done scripts.

Read full topic
